content: Povero Pinocchio! Cerc√≤ anche di strapparsi i capelli, ma dato che erano soltanto dipinti sulla sua testa di legno, non riusciva nemmeno a tirarli.
translations: eng:Poor Pinocchio! He even tried to tear his hair, but as it was only painted on his wooden head, he could not even pull it
